body_html: @meder411 Well then I assume that you didn't read the comments in the PR I linked above. By the time this happens, the data transmitting queue is already corrupted and if we try-catch, the next fetch will crash/hang anyways. This is because Python doesn't do this retry. So we can't do much.

body: @meder411 Well then I assume that you didn't read the comments in the PR I linked above. By the time this happens, the data transmitting queue is already corrupted and if we try-catch, the next fetch will crash/hang anyways. This is because Python doesn't do this retry. So we can't do much.
